verses.verse: Thus <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, <S%H1980>Go<s%>, and <S%H7069>buy<s%> a <S%H3335>potter<s%>'s <S%H2789>earthen<s%> <S%H1228>bottle<s%>, and take of the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%>, and of the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of the <S%H3548>priests<s%>;

and go <S%H3318>forth<s%> unto the <S%H1516>valley<s%> of the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2011>Hinnom<s%>, which is by the <S%H6607>entry<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> <S%H2777>Harsith<s%>, and <S%H7121>proclaim<s%> there the <S%H1697>words<s%> that I shall tell <S%H1696>thee<s%>;

and <S%H559>say<s%>, <S%H8085>Hear<s%> ye the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, O <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>: thus <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H935>Behold<s%>, I will bring <S%H7451>evil<s%> upon this <S%H4725>place<s%>, which whosoever <S%H8085>heareth<s%>, his <S%H241>ears<s%> shall <S%H6750>tingle<s%>.

Because they have <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> <S%H5234>me<s%>, and have estranged this <S%H4725>place<s%>, and have burned <S%H6999>incense<s%> in it unto <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%>, that they <S%H3045>knew<s%> <S%H1>not<s%>, they and their fathers and the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>; and have <S%H4390>filled<s%> this <S%H4725>place<s%> with the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of <S%H5355>innocents<s%>,

and have <S%H1129>built<s%> the high <S%H1116>places<s%> of <S%H1168>Baal<s%>, to <S%H8313>burn<s%> their <S%H1121>sons<s%> in the <S%H784>fire<s%> for <S%H5930>burnt-offerings<s%> unto <S%H1168>Baal<s%>; which I <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H1696>not<s%>, nor spake <S%H5927>it<s%>, neither came it into my <S%H3820>mind<s%>:

therefore <S%H3117><s%>, behold, the days <S%H935>come<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, that this <S%H4725>place<s%> shall no more be <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H8612>Topheth<s%>, nor The <S%H1516>valley<s%> of the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2011>Hinnom<s%>, but The <S%H1516>valley<s%> of <S%H2028>Slaughter<s%>.

And I will make <S%H1238>void<s%> the <S%H6098>counsel<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> in this <S%H4725>place<s%>; and I will cause them to <S%H5307>fall<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> their <S%H341>enemies<s%>, and by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of them that <S%H1245>seek<s%> their <S%H5315>life<s%>: and their dead <S%H5038>bodies<s%> will I <S%H5414>give<s%> to be <S%H3978>food<s%> for the <S%H5775>birds<s%> of the <S%H8064>heavens<s%>, and for the <S%H929>beasts<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>.

And I will <S%H7760>make<s%> this <S%H5892>city<s%> an <S%H8047>astonishment<s%>, and a <S%H8322>hissing<s%>; every one that <S%H5674>passeth<s%> thereby shall be <S%H8074>astonished<s%> and <S%H8319>hiss<s%> because of all the plagues <S%H4347>thereof<s%>.

And I will cause them to <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of their <S%H1121>sons<s%> and the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of their <S%H1323>daughters<s%>; and they shall <S%H398>eat<s%> every <S%H376>one<s%> the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of his <S%H7453>friend<s%>, in the <S%H4692>siege<s%> and in the <S%H4689>distress<s%>, wherewith their <S%H341>enemies<s%>, and they that <S%H1245>seek<s%> their <S%H5315>life<s%>, shall distress <S%H6693>them<s%>.
Then shalt thou <S%H7665>break<s%> the <S%H1228>bottle<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H582>men<s%> that go with <S%H1980>thee<s%>,

and shalt <S%H559>say<s%> unto <S%H559>them<s%>, Thus saith <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>: Even <S%H3602>so<s%> will I <S%H7665>break<s%> this <S%H5971>people<s%> and this <S%H5892>city<s%>, as one <S%H7665>breaketh<s%> a <S%H3335>potter<s%>'s <S%H3627>vessel<s%>, that <S%H3201>cannot<s%> be made whole <S%H7495>again<s%>; and they shall <S%H6912>bury<s%> in <S%H8612>Topheth<s%>, till there be no <S%H4725>place<s%> to <S%H6912>bury<s%>.

Thus will I <S%H6213>do<s%> unto this <S%H4725>place<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and to the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> <S%H5414>thereof<s%>, even making this <S%H5892>city<s%> as <S%H8612>Topheth<s%>:

and the <S%H1004>houses<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, and the <S%H1004>houses<s%> of the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, which are <S%H2931>defiled<s%>, shall be as the <S%H4725>place<s%> of <S%H8612>Topheth<s%>, even all the <S%H1004>houses<s%> upon whose <S%H1406>roofs<s%> they have burned <S%H6999>incense<s%> unto all the <S%H6635>host<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%>, and have poured <S%H5258>out<s%> <S%H5262>drink-offerings<s%> unto <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%>.

Then <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> from <S%H8612>Topheth<s%>, whither <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> had <S%H7971>sent<s%> him to <S%H5012>prophesy<s%>; and he <S%H5975>stood<s%> in the <S%H2691>court<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> to all the <S%H5971>people<s%>:

Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H935>Behold<s%>, I will bring upon this <S%H5892>city<s%> and upon all its <S%H5892>towns<s%> all the <S%H7451>evil<s%> that I have <S%H1696>pronounced<s%> against <S%H6203>it<s%>; because they have made their neck <S%H7185>stiff<s%>, that they may not <S%H8085>hear<s%> my <S%H1697>words<s%>.
